page.title: 02Country Trails
page.content: Steeple Morden is perfect for country walks and trails.There are many bridle-ways where anyone can take their pony or dog.At the bottom of my garden their is a small stream,and the dogs love to go for a run down there.As long as I keep to the edge of the fields the farmer doesn't mind a bit. At the bottom of Bogs Gap Lane is a bridle-way leading to Abington Piggots,half way down the bridle-way is a small patch of roughage which is now a conservation area.Young trees have been planted to take place of the old ones that have been cut down.All sorts of wildlife is in that area,and I think it is a very good idea to conserve it.
